m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialCollapsible type="ACCORDION" grid="s12 m6 l8">
<!-- ITEM 1 -->
<m:MaterialCollapsibleItem>
<m:MaterialCollapsibleHeader>
<m:MaterialLink text="First" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" textColor="black"/>
</m:MaterialCollapsibleHeader>
<m:MaterialCollapsibleBody>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Preselected Section
m:MaterialTitle.description: If you want a collapsible with a preopened section just add active='1' the parameter is the index of the collapsible item.
